snippet: Martha Coakley announced Monday that she was running for governor in 2014. The race has drawn four other Democrats.
abstract: Democrat Martha Coakley joins the 2014 race for Massachusetts governor.
lead_paragraph: Martha Coakley announced Monday that she was running for governor in 2014. The race has drawn four other Democrats.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Attorney General Joins the Race for Governor
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Attorney General Joins the Race For Governor
